AI Description: Ismapper is a software for isomiR identification and differential expression analysis from small RNA-seq data. It is designed to accurately map and quantify isomiRs, which are isoforms of microRNAs resulting from alternative precursor processing and post-transcriptional modifications.
Core Features: Accurate Mapping & Quantification Of Isomirs, Identification Of Differentially Expressed Isomirs, Analysis Of Small RNA-Seq Data, Visualization Of Isomir Expression Patterns
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Computational Biology, Small RNA-Seq, Mirna Analysis
